sentences: Hän on tarkka muistamaan pienet yksityiskohdat.
context: The Finnish word 'tarkka' is an adjective that means precise, accurate, or careful. It describes something that is done with great attention to detail and without errors. When referring to people, it can describe someone who is meticulous and pays close attention to details. The word can be used in various contexts such as measurements (precise), work performance (accurate/careful), or observation skills (attentive).
